subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Giants are one win from the title, but eight of the last 10 teams that headed home with a 3-2 World Series deficit, including the Royals in 1985, rallied to win.
snippet: The Giants are one win from the title, but eight of the last 10 teams that headed home with a 3-2 World Series deficit, including the Royals in 1985, rallied to win.
